Class UnitAttackAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.client.gui.animation.UnitAttackAnimation

  • final class UnitAttackAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for the animation of units attacks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnitAttackAnimation

        public UnitAttackAnimation(GUI gui,
                           Unit attacker,
                           Unit defender,
                           Tile attackerTile,
                           Tile defenderTile,
                           boolean success)
        Build a new attack animation.
        Parameters:
        gui - The GUI to display on.
        attacker - The Unit that is attacking.
        defender - The Unit that is defending.
        attackerTile - The Tile the attack comes from.
        defenderTile - The Tile the attack goes to.
        success - Does the attack succeed?

    • Method Detail

                                           Map.Direction direction)
        Find the animation for a unit attack.
        Parameters:
        unit - The Unit to animate.
        direction - The Direction of the attack.
        Returns:
        An animation, if available.
